text.title: Blues musician B.B. King dies aged 89
text.head: Blues musician B.B. King dies aged 89
Sources

list.item: Randy Lewis. "Blues legend B.B. King, inspiration to generations of musicians, dies at 89" — Los Angeles Times , May 15, 2015
"Blues Legend B.B King Dies in Las Vegas" — Sky News , May 15, 2015
Bernard Zuel. "BB King Dead, 89, In Las Vegas" — The Sydney Morning Herald , May 15, 2015
"BB King, the king of Blues, dies at 89" — BBC News Online , May 15, 2015
Ken Ritter (AP ). "'King of the Blues' Blues Legend B.B. King Dead at Age 89" — ABC News (US) , May 15, 2015
